Service Details: - Protects the legal and financial interests of children and youth under the authority of a range of provincial laws- Works on behalf of and directly with children and youth as well as with their parents or guardians- Services to children and youth fall into four areas:  Settlement Submissions Under the 'Infants Act'; Trust Services; Property Guardian Services; and Protective Services
Address & Map: 808 West Hastings St, #700Vancouver, BC     V6C 3L3View MapQuest Map
